required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Regulation and Signaling of Red Blood Cell (RBC) Endothelial Nitric Oxide Synthase (eNOS) in Patients With Stable and Unstable Coronary Artery Disease
clinical_study.official_title: Regulation and Signaling of RBC-eNOS in Patients With Stable and Unstable Coronary Artery Disease

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of this study is measurement of expression and activity of RBC eNOS in different clinical cohorts of patients with coronary artery disease and acute coronary syndrome and to investigate the importance of the NO-stimulated reaction cascade in terms of sGC and PKG.

primary_outcome.measure: Determination of red cell endothelial nitric oxide-synthase (eNOS)-expression and - activity

secondary_outcome.measure: Deformability and stability of red blood cell membrane
secondary_outcome.description: by Laser assisted Optical Rotational Cell Analyzer (LORCA)
Determination of microvascular function with Laser-Doppler Perfusion Imaging
Determination of arterial stiffness with pulse wave analysis during blood pressure measurement or echocardiography.

secondary_outcome.measure: Determination of nitrate and nitrite in blood plasma and red blood cells (RBC)
Determination of nitric oxide and cyclic guanosine monophosphate (cGMP) in blood plasma and in red blood cells
Aging and turnover of red blood cells
Redox status of red blood cells
secondary_outcome.description: Determination of redox status of red blood cells will be measured on free thiole with thioltracker and reactive oxygen species( ROS) by dihydrodichlorofluorescein
Determination of aggregation of red blood cells with LORCA

secondary_outcome.measure: Expression and function of soluble guanylyl cyclase (sGC) in red blood cells
secondary_outcome.description: measurement of enzyme expression and activity

secondary_outcome.measure: Expression and activity of Protein Kinase G (PKG)
secondary_outcome.description: measurement of enzyme expression and activity

secondary_outcome.measure: Determination of leucocyte populations and leucocyte function

arm_group.description: Patients with stable coronary artery disease
Patients with acute coronar syndrome, instable Angina pectoris and low-risk NSTEMI
healthy control group without clinical apparent arteriosclerosis

study_pop.textblock:
3 groups:
- ACS group (100 Patients)
- stable CAD group (100 Patients)
- healthy control group (100 Healthy Volunteers)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- informed consent
- for ACS(acute coronary syndrome)-Group: angiographic coronary artery disease; acute coronary syndrome, defined by EITHER unstable angina pectoris with significant coronary stenosis (troponin negative, without significant ST-elevation) OR low-risk NSTEMI (Troponin positive, without significant ST-elevation)
- for stable CAD-Group: angiographic coronary artery disease; no acute coronary syndrome within the last 3 months
- healthy control group: No clinical or angiographical signs of apparent atherosclerosis
Exclusion Criteria:
- acute inflammation (CRP > 1 mg/dl, leukocyte > 11.000/Âµl)
- malignant diseases
- pregnancy
- medication with NO-donors ( e.g.isosorbide mononitrate, isosorbide dinitrate, glyceryl trinitrate, Molsidomin, Ranexa)
- patients with STEMI or high-risk NSTEMI

overall_official.affiliation: Department of Cardiology, Pneumology and Angiology, University Hospital Duesseldorf
